name: OpenDocument Chart Document Format (ODC), Version 1.2.  Part of OASIS Open Document Format for Office Applications, Version 1.2 and the equivalent ISO 26300-1:2015.
definition: An XML-based format for a chart that is editable or dynamically generated from a data source.  File extension .odc is used for a free-standing chart.   May be embedded within other document formats in the OpenDocument Format (ODF) family.  Documented in ODF 1.2 Part 1.
